references.paper_title: Neural networks can learn representations with gradient descent
references.reason: This paper establishes a fundamental theoretical result demonstrating that neural networks can learn low-dimensional representations with gradient descent, providing a crucial foundation for the current work.

references.paper_title: Online stochastic gradient descent on non-convex losses from high-dimensional inference
references.reason: This work analyzes the behavior of SGD on non-convex losses, providing insights into the sample complexity of learning single-index models that are essential to understanding the current paper's results.

references.paper_title: Learning single-index models with shallow neural networks
references.reason: This paper studies the problem of learning single-index models using shallow neural networks, offering a direct comparison with the current work and its use of deeper networks.

references.paper_title: Learning polynomials in few relevant dimensions
references.reason: This paper explores the statistical query approach to learning low-dimensional polynomials, providing an information-theoretic benchmark for the current paper's algorithm.

references.paper_title: Smoothing the landscape boosts the signal for SGD: Optimal sample complexity for learning single index models
references.reason: This paper investigates the effect of smoothing on SGD, highlighting how this technique can impact sample complexity and improving upon the existing results on single-index model learning.
